title: Illuminating Angels And Demons-(WTC-SWE)
description:
ILLUMINATING ANGELS AND DEMONS
                        --------------------------------


This in-depth documetary examines the Path of Illumination stretching throug renaissance Rome, as discussed in Dan Brown's book Angels & Demons, to discover what is true and what is false. It looks at works of artists, scientists, Popes, emperors, ...    Full Descriptionkings, Freemasons, Knights Templar, and more. This visually stunning travelogue examines the intrigue in baroque and renaissance Rome and the implications it holds for us today.

This documentary questions the theories laid out in Dan Brown's THE DA VINCI CODE by building upon the theories proposed in Simon Cox's book, CRACKING THE DA VINCI CODE. Based on Cox's follow-up bestseller, ILLUMINATING ANGELS AND DEVILS, the program explores the truths and fictions of Brown's "Path of Illumination," going back as far as Renaissance-era Rome. In addition to providing insight into Brown's novel, ILLUMINATING ANGELS AND DEVILS also brings Roman history vividly to life.




Narrated by: Dave Hoffman
